About


A paravane is a type of underwater glider used for destroying naval mines in the path of ships. Our firm serves a similar purposeâ€”neutralizing obstacles in the path to success for our startups.

Paravane Ventures is the parent brand of a collection of rapidly growing startups founded by Google, Facebook, Microsoft and McKinsey alumni. These ventures range from ecommerce to media to software.
